disclaimer.title: Important Information
disclaimer.pop_up_text: This chatbot provides information for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, and treatment. For personal health concerns, please consult a healthcare professional.
disclaimer.inline_text: Your privacy is important to us. We do not store any usage data from this site.
disclaimer.tooltip: Your privacy is important. All interactions are kept anonymous, and personal information is not stored. Contact our support team if you need more details.
disclaimer.select_role_text: Hi, welcome to Oyuna. Please select your role to proceed:
disclaimer.select_age_group_text: Thanks, for best experience, please select your group:

error.network: Oops, it looks like we're having trouble connecting. Please check your internet connection and try again. If this keeps happening, there may be an issue on our side.
error.server: Oh no! Something went wrong on our end. Our team is already working on it. Please try again later.
error.invalid_input: I'm having trouble understanding your last message. Could you try rephrasing it or giving me a bit more detail?
error.timeout: Sorry, this is taking longer than expected. We might be experiencing high traffic or a complex request. Please try again in a moment.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. We apologize for the trouble. Please try again, and if the issue persists, contact our support team.
error.rate_limit: It looks like you've sent quite a few messages in a short time. Please wait a moment before trying again.
error.invalid_user: Sorry, because I am an AI, I must comply with responsible and safe AI usage. I need a parent supervision to use the chat feature. Please, bring an adult and safely use the chat feature through them.

feedback.title: We value your feedback!
feedback.description: Take a quick 5-minute survey to help us improve.

starter_bot_message.default: Hello! I'm Oyuna. If you have questions about menstruation, feel free to talk with me. Who are you? (Please let me know if you are a woman, parent, teacher, or man.) I am ready to help you.
starter_bot_message.option_for_myself: Hello! I'm Oyuna. I’m here to answer your questions about menstruation. If you want to understand more about your body changes, feel free to talk with me.
starter_bot_message.option_parent: Hello! I'm Oyuna. I’m here to answer your questions regarding your child's menstruation. If you’d like to discuss preparing your child for this change or providing emotional support, please reach out.
starter_bot_message.option_teacher: Hello! I'm Oyuna. I’m here to help you support your students' needs related to menstruation in the classroom. If you’re seeking advice on how to provide support in a learning environment, feel free to contact me.
starter_bot_message.option_friend: Hello! I'm Oyuna. If you’d like advice on how to support friends with menstruation, feel free to talk with me. I’m ready to offer tips on how to help.
